Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Chick-fil-A restaurants will reverse their longstanding policy and start opening on Sundays. The expert's verdict states that the claim is false and that Chick-fil-A has indicated no plans to reverse their closed-on-Sunday policy.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on rumors circulating on social media, which were debunked by the company themselves.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Chick-fil-A restaurants will reverse their policy without providing any evidence or official statement.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict provides an alternative explanation by stating that the claim originated from rumors and that Chick-fil-A has consistently denied any plans to change their closed-on-Sunday policy.
